name: Elementalist
flavor_text: An elemental magic user who uses their mastery over their chosen elements to defeat their enemies.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: You can summon forth your chosen magic to perform minor tasks and tricks as are reasonable for your element.

fields.name: eg
fields.text: You can summon flames to start a fire or shed light, or use psychic powers to pull a book from the shelves. Your base damage is also based on your element.

fields.name: flavor
fields.text: A burst of elemental energy surrounds you, warding off nearby foes.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: Attack all creatures within 5ft of you. Dealing base damage to those you hit.

fields.name: flavor
fields.text: Surround yourself or an ally with your element, bolstering their natural abilities.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: Select yourself or an ally you can see within 30ft of you, add your intellect to the next Mettle or Agility test they make. If you have fortunes favor, you can spend it to double the bonus Enhance provides.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: Pick one of the following options to enhance yourself

choices.title: Elemental Armor
choices.desc: Add your Intellect to your armor and take half damage from your chosen element.

choices.title: Bolt Thrower
choices.desc: Increase your base attack range by 30ft

choices.title: Bigger Burst
choices.desc: Increase the size of your burst to all creatures within 10ft of you.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: Increase one of your stats by 1 (max 5)
